propSpec.name: pageNumber
propSpec.desc: The current page number for the doc

propSpec.name: scale
propSpec.desc: A number defining the zoom level

propSpec.name: minScale
propSpec.desc: A number defining the minimum scale value

propSpec.name: maxScale
propSpec.desc: A number defining the maximum scale value

propSpec.name: value
propSpec.desc: The path pointing to the pdf document to view

propSpec.name: rotationStep
propSpec.desc: A number defining the rotation step

propSpec.name: doDownload
propSpec.desc: When true, the pdf viewer will be downloaded

propSpec.name: doReset
propSpec.desc: When true, the pdf viewer will be reset

propSpec.name: doPage
propSpec.desc: A number specifying current pdf page

propSpec.name: rotation
propSpec.desc: A number specifying current document rotation
